channel.title: Oakley Metal Plate OX5038 – Men’s Designer Eyewear
channel.description: One man working from his garage with only $300 has now turned into a multi-billion dollar corporation. Owned by Italian firm, Luxottica, in a huge buyout deal, Oakley are now a worldwide designer eyewear manufacturer. Boasting the likes of Vogue in their portfolio, Luxottica have really boosted the brand to luxury status. Formed in 1975 [...]
